    level="1"
    right="Feat 4"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Double Shot](/Feats.aspx?ID=4788) <actions string="Two Actions" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Fighter" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=601" />
<trait label="Flourish" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=73" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=216) pg. 143 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Archetypes** [Archer](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=47) (Level 6), [Archer](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=238) (Level 6)

**Requirements**
You are wielding a ranged weapon with reload 0

</column>

---

You shoot twice in blindingly fast succession. Make two Strikes, each against a separate target and with a –2 penalty. Both attacks count toward your multiple attack penalty, but the penalty doesn’t increase until after you’ve made both of them.

<title level="2">Double Shot leads to...</title>
[Triple Shot](/Feats.aspx?ID=4808)
